name: Digital Pinball: Last Gladiators
description:
Digital Pinball: Last Gladiators is an action game.
Digital Pinball: Last Gladiators is available on SEGA Saturn.
It was produced by Jason Elias and Joann Perritano. Norio Nakagata directed the game. Naoto Shibata and Yusuke Takahama scored the game.
